entry.title: Simple Way to Custom UIView
entry.content:
Create UIViewController SubClass

create two file : AlterViewController.h and AlterViewController.m. .h file is the head file like C style. we can create class and declare property. .m file is is the implementation file it implement method and create instance object.

create AlterViewController.h file

We should import UIKith to head file and then inherit from UIViewController

create AlterViewController.m file

create implementation of AlterViewController. We should import AlterViewController.h and then implementation AlterViewController and override viewDidLoad method and so on .

Define UIView property

UIView is flexible and easy to customize We can use iOS API to set its propety.We can set frame（position,size）、background color、gesture… etc. let’s look at the details.

Init UIView

UIView *alterView = [[UIView alloc]init];
in objective-c we can get an instance object use grammar like
Object *property = [[ Object alloc]init]
alloc return a new instance and initialized to a data structrue that describes the class memory for all other instance variables is set to 0;

set UIView Position and size

In the first pleace we should have a concept of view coordinator system in UIKit .The default coordinate system has its origin in the top-left corner and has axes that extend down and to the right from the origin point .Firgure 1 show this concept
Figure 1

We can set UIView postion and size with frame rectangle. It create a rectangle return from CGRectMake Function that can define the position of rectangle

CGRectMake have four arguments: x,y rectangle width and height
CGRect CGRectMake(CGFloat x, CGFloat y, CGFloat width, CGFloat height);
you should get x,y-coordinate depends the origin point (0,0) at the top-left corner
For the example, I want to set UIView height with 160 and width with screenwidth -30
Why subtract 30 ? because the X is 15 I want the UIView have a same safe area to the phone border The Firure 2 show the description .
Figure 2

The height same as the above. set height is 160 so I should subtract the View height and margin that’s why Y = screenHeight - 175 (175 = 160 +15)

For this section we set the UIView position and size completed.

Add UIView to view that is receiver

We already create View and set the view position. we should add the view to the SuperView now
background: When we create view and want to display it add a view to the end of the receiver’s list of subviews is necessary. we can use ddSubviewmethod
From the Apple API description:
the method establishes a strong reference to view and set its next responder to the receiver,which is its new superview. Views can have only one superview.If view already has a superview and that view is not receiver,this method removes the privious superview before making the receiver its new superview.

Add sub view method:

self.view rpresents the current view not the view we just created. alterView will be presented soon.

Add Gesture Recognizer(optional)

If you want to listener the tap action we should add tap recognizer to the View.For example you want to dismiss the UIView when to tap the point out of UIView.

UITapGestureRecognizer object have a action of selector you should define the selector,eg: we can dismiss our UIView.

Display the UIView

Now we can display the UIView on the other View.

  • import AlterViewController.h file
    #import "AlterViewController.h"
  • create instance of AlterViewController
    #import "AlterViewController.h"
  • set presentation style
    alter.modalPresentationStyle = UIModalPresentationOverCurrentContext;
  • present view
    [self presentViewController:alter animated:YES completion:nil];

Explain: when we present the view we the the modal style. you can found the guide from here
https://developer.apple.com/library/content/featuredarticles/ViewControllerPGforiPhoneOS/PresentingaViewController.html

UIModalPresentationOverCurrentContext result like figure 3

Figure 3 The current context presentation style

Full source file

Source file https://github.com/shuiqingliu/IOS_Dev/tree/master/Assignment1/Assignment1

Credit

@xizhou help me to understand the concepte of UITapGestureRecongnizer.

entry.title: Ssh 不能连接 Github 的一次搞笑经历
entry.content:
Background Information:

Environment ：Mac Sierra10.12.6,OpenSSH,Global Proxy with IPv6
ERROR like this photo below:

ssh_exchange_identification: Connection closed by remote host

How to find the main problem:

Search the error info on Google

I searched for a long time and try it by myself,all of not work I realized that the problem was not that simple. So I go to next way.

Analyse Error message

I found the Message give me key_load_public: no such file or directory,this message cause me to focus on this direction .As you know it still don’t work well,when you check the connection with command ssh -T git@github.com -vvv you can get the same message of the key_load even if you can connect properly.

I saw a message when I very upset,It is Connecting to github.com port 21473,Holy S**t as you know the ssh default port is 22 ,I am stupid to use 21473 connect the github, I recall that I have changed the local ssh port. so I type ssh -T -p 22 git@github.com it worked well.

Solve problem

There have to ways to solve this,the first way is change the ssh port to default value 22,the second way use Using SSH over the HTTPS port

Finally

Enjoy your coding time and focus on the error message.
entry.summary: Background Informat

entry.title: How to Driver BCM94352 on MacOS Sierra(10.12.5)
entry.content:
PS: You should first look over tolede’s github :https://github.com/toleda/wireless_half-mini/ before you read this article

Base Information

Item Value
HardWare Name BCM94352HMB
Vendor ID 14E4
Device ID 43B1
System Version macOS Sierra(10.12.5 16F73)
Laptop info Hasee K610-I7-D2

Driver WIFI and Bluetooth

There are a few steps for dealing with wif & bluetooth

  • Setting your BIOS
  • Add the necessary kext to your /L/E forlder
  • Add the necessary patch to your config.list

Tools:

  • KCPM Utility Pro
  • Clover Configurator
  • DPCIManager
  • IORegistryExplorer

Tools Download

Setting your BIOS

Reboot your computer and then quickly press the ESC button,When you into the BIOS option select SCU Item then move to Advanced option ,the very important step is set the value of XHC tosmart auto
The operation like this

Add the necessary kext of WIFI

  • Download the newer version of FakePCIID Kext from RehabMan’s bitbucket
    https://bitbucket.org/RehabMan/os-x-fake-pci-id/downloads/
  • Unzip the download file and then use KCMP Utility Pro tools to install FakePCIID.kext , FakePCIID_Broadcom_WiFi.kext and FakePCIID_XHCIMux.kext into /Library/Extensions

Add the necessary kext of Bluetooth

  • Download the newer version of BrcmFirmwareRepo.kext and BrcmPatchRAM2.kext from RehabMan’s bitbucket https://bitbucket.org/RehabMan/os-x-brcmpatchram/downloads/
  • Unzip the download file and the use install the two files into /Library/Extensions

Add the necessary patch to config.list

  • I already upload the KextsToPatch part of my config.list see it here https://1drv.ms/u/s!Amlm6pusnQYKeVcY1hUHugHsZeU
    you can paste the whole patch into your config.list
  • you must add the fellow patch to DSDT the path is ACPI/DSDT/Patches/

Verify and check

When you driver the BCM94352HMB you can check it use IORegistryExplorer tools,open the tools you can find the bluetooth port.connect to network and try to use AirDrop Enjoy your hackintosh!

Screenshot





Credit

@RehabMan
@toleda
@jqqqqqqqqqq
@wx3124558
@yuxans

PS:If you find a grammatical error please let me know, I am learning to write a blog in English this time.
entry.summary: PS: You should first look over tolede’s github :

entry.title: [OJ刷题]题目1464：Hello World for U
entry.content:
题目：

题目描述：
Given any string of N (>=5) characters, you are asked to form the characters into the shape of U. For example, “helloworld” can be printed as:
h d
e l
l r
lowo
That is, the characters must be printed in the original order, starting top-down from the left vertical line with n1 characters, then left to right along the bottom line with n2 characters, and finally bottom-up along the vertical line with n3 characters. And more, we would like U to be as squared as possible – that is, it must be satisfied that n1 = n3 = max { k| k <= n2 for all 3 <= n2 <= N } with n1 + n2 + n3 - 2 = N.
输入：
There are multiple test cases.Each case contains one string with no less than 5 and no more than 80 characters in a line. The string contains no white space.
输出：
For each test case, print the input string in the shape of U as specified in the description.
样例输入：
helloworld!
ac.jobdu.com
样例输出：
h !
e d
l l
lowor
a m
c o
. c
jobdu.

AC Answer:

注意点：

  • 判系统是有多组test case输入，所以需要使用while来判断EOF
  • 每组用例输出结果最后一行需要换行

晒图：


最后祝大家刷题愉快！
entry.summary:
题目：

题目描述：
Given any string of N (>=5) characters, y

entry.title: Codeblocks使用技巧
entry.content:
Code::Blocks is a free, open-source, cross-platform IDE. Using a plugin architecture, its capabilities and features are defined by the provided plugins.

初始安装:

1. 添加codeblocks的仓库

​ 因为我用的Ubuntu所以直接去添加仓库：

https://launchpad.net/~damien-moore/+archive/ubuntu/codeblocks-stable/

2. 按照提示输入命令添加

简单配置：

1. 配置使用的终端类型

Setting--->General settings ----> Terminal to launch console programs
选择 genome-terminal -t $TITLE -x

2. 配置打开默认工程

Setting--->General settings--->Open default workspace 
还要设置下on project load 为 open all project files

3. 配置语法颜色主题和光标颜色

Setting-->Editor--->Margins and caret在caret栏目选择颜色和宽度就可（光标）
Setting-->Editor--->Syntax highlight 设置颜色主题

可能遇到的问题：

1. 配置文件不能保存

  • 检查配置文件的权限

  • 如果用户和所属组均为root 则修改权限

2. 新添加的文件不能编译运行

  • 很有可能编辑目标没有设置，需要在add file的时候就勾选build target如下:
entry.summary: Code::Blocks is a free, open-source, cross-platform IDE. Using a plugin architecture, its capabilities and features are defi

entry.title: 给WNDR3800刷OpenWRT
entry.content:
• 背景：我拿到机子之前是刷过openwrt的，然后系统崩溃了，DHCP和wifi全挂了，我直接TFTP再刷一次openwrt

Let’s do it!

1.下载原厂的固件

下载地址

2.进入TFTP刷机模式进行刷机

PS：先给Ubuntu装个tftp：sudo apt-get install tftp

  • 长按reset键，直至绿灯闪烁时松开即可，此时就已进入了TFTP模式
  • 将本机PC IP 设为静态的192.168.1.2子网掩码255.255.255.0

  • 输入如下命令,然后耐心的等待重启，直至绿灯长亮说明系统启动完毕(大约5分钟)

    具体输入如下图所示：

3.登录路由器进行相关配置

3.1配置ssh
  • 首次登录需要需要先telnet登录设置密码然后用ssh登录

如图：

3.2进行配置
3.2.1进入web 登录Luci
  • 地址为：192.168.1.1,密码为之前设置的密码，登录之后在Network下wifi目录下打开wifi并点击edit-Wireless Security设置wifi密码.
3.2.2安装中文包
  • 在system-software-avaliable package搜索chinese安装base-zh-cn那个包就OK了.
3.2.3题外话
  • 接下来安装ss，chinadns就不说了这个教程到处都是自己找找就行了
  • 还有如果要恢复为官方固件的话也是TFTP刷，只不过put的镜像为官方img罢了

来张web界面图：
entry.summary:
• 背景：我拿到机子之前是刷过openwrt的，然后系统崩溃了，DHCP和wifi全挂了，我直接TFTP再刷一次openwrt

Let’s do it!

<

entry.title: Ubuntu 安装Nvidia 驱动之后Unity消失的解决办法
entry.id: http://shuiqingliu.com/2016/04/21/ubuntu-安装nvidia-驱动之后unity消失的解决办法/
entry.content:
在安装nvidia官方驱动之后Unity消失，开机后只有桌面文件和壁纸，对于这种情况可通过如下方法解决：

  • 1.在桌面上右键打开terminal
  • 2.安装ccsm
  • 3.在终端输入ccsm
  • 4.将下图中的opengl和unity plugin 都打开，Unity就出现了，问题解决，如果未能解决，请在终端输入software-properties-gtk --open-tab=4 打开addition driver 选择xorg-xserver然后再执行如下操作

entry.title: Android Studio不能自动完成更新的解决办法
entry.id: http://shuiqingliu.com/2015/12/05/android-studio不能自动完成更新的解决办法/
entry.content:
昨天Android Studio提示我更新到2.0 preview 2也就是AI-143.2461418，但是3M的补丁，点击update and restart 后等下载后as关闭但是没有自动重启并且在再次手动打开还是提示更新，没有自动完成升级。

解决办法：Linux下找到home/username/.AndroidStudio(版本号)/restart/restarter.sh 将改脚本执行一下即可完成升级脚本内容自己可以看一下

entry.title: Wordpress迁移后文章和页面404解决办法
entry.id: http://shuiqingliu.com/2015/11/26/wordpress迁移后文章和页面404解决办法/
entry.content:
由于我服务器lamp环境是我手动搭建的，经过排查伪静态服务没有开启，查了下是在apache2.conf 文件中添加如下信息ps:我博客就放在/var/www/html


Options Indexes FollowSymLinks
AllowOverride All
Require all granted

这还不行，还需要开启apache的rewrite模块，由于我服务器是Ubuntu系统很简单，一个命令搞定：
sudo　a2enmod rewrite
sudo service apache2 restart
问题完美解决

Opti

entry.title: 解决dnsmasq默认修改/etc/resolv.conf 的nameserver为127.0.0.1
entry.content:
事出有因，今天早上肖神说想用anyconnect，我登上服务器准备wget安装文件结果unable to resolve host address。cat /etc/resolv.conf 一看nameserver变为了127.0.0.1。 查了下，修改/etc/resolvconf/resolvconf.d/base 然后resolvconf -u 更新不起作用，更改/etc/network/interfaces 添加dns-nameserver 也不起作用，偶尔我吧dnsmasq stop后查看/etc/resolv.conf 变回了默认的google的nameserver，我restart dnsmasq resolv.conf 又被修改了，原来是dnsmasq搞的鬼。查了下http://raspberrypi.stackexchange.com/questions/37439/proper-way-to-prevent-dnsmasq-from-overwriting-dns-server-list-supplied-by-dhcp 是这个原因。
在/etc/default/dnsmasq中添加DNSMASQ_EXCEPT=lo
问题得到解决，dns服务也可用了，wget也可以了。

entry.title: C#进行CAD二次开发单行文字不显示问题
entry.id: http://shuiqingliu.com/2015/09/24/c进行cad二次开发单行文字不显示问题/
entry.content: 好长时间不更新博客了！！！一直没搞技术研究了，惭愧惭愧。今天分享下这个问题的解决方法，他困扰了我一天。刚接触CAD的二次开发，当我做一个简单的创建单行文字的时候，代码编译执行都没有问题，然而他却不显示，find命令查找可以查找到文字对象啊，当我保存当前dwg，重新打开的时候可以显示了！我误打误撞结果把CAD工具栏搞没了，我就重置工作空间为CAD经典了，原来我之前的工作空间一直是草稿和注释！这就是问题关键。好了将你的CAD工作空间设置为CAD经典，问题解决。

entry.title: 百度地图在自定义Fragment中设置不显示缩放控件
entry.id: http://shuiqingliu.com/2015/05/29/百度地图在自定义fragment中设置不显示缩放控件/
entry.content:
项目中需要去掉百度地图MapView中的缩放控件，因为他实在是太丑了而且占据了右下角的位置所以需要将他设置为不可见。先放出代码慢慢说：

1.首先我的Fragment的布局根节点为RelativeLayout，首先获得Relativelayout的View 对

2.创建带有参数的MapView对象其中如下则为设置缩放控件不显示

3.然后设置mapview在RelativeLayout中的摆放，因为其父控件为RelativeLayout所以这里使用

来给他设置wrap_content。
4.将mapview 添加到RelatvieLayout中
将通过RelativeLayout的id获取到的view转型为RelativeLayout，然后调用其addView方法将MapView添加到布局中。

这就完成了将MapView动态添加到Fragment并设置其缩放控件不显示的步骤，如果你看到了这里非常感谢您。下方高能预警，不要打我

 

 

 

 

 

其实，我昨晚睡了一觉今天早上发现了3.4的sdk在mapview中已经直接提供了设置方法。那就是直接在布局文件中创建MapView然后通过如下方法设置

希望你看到这里不要骂我，其实应该高兴，因为昨晚上我花了好几个小时，在想如何抛弃官方的SupportMapFragment来实现MapView的添加，用我自定义的Fragment来添加。这下想出来了，替你想好了。多省时省力。

entry.title: Ubuntu 删除Ifupdown（eth0）
entry.content:
第一步：sudo subl /etc/network/interfaces

删除其他内容只保留如下：

interfaces(5) file used by ifup(8) and ifdown(8)

auto lo
iface lo inet loopback

第二步 ：sudo subl /etc/NetworkManager/NetworkManager.conf

将其中：

[ifupdown]
managed=true

改为：

[ifupdown]
managed=false

第三步：重启networkmanager服务

sudo service network-manager restart
entry.summary:
第一步：sudo subl /etc/network/interfaces

删除其他内容只保留如下：

entry.title: 流氓之WPS
entry.content: WPS，大流氓一只。你要是装了这货，那就坑了。当你卸载后他还是会关联DOC,PPT,XLS等等。导致你office2013安装默认打开图标还是空白的。为了解决这个流氓带来的问题，你得重装下这个流氓然后用流氓自己的配置工具取消文件关联才可以。ksomisc.exe用它配置；路径C:\Users\xxx\AppData\Local\Kingsoft\WPS Office\9.1.0.5060\office6

entry.title: 百度地图API Android Sdk导入jar和so文件
entry.content:
首先，在导入百度地图SDK的时候对于android studio来讲应该将BaiduLBS_Android.jar 添加到项目的libs目录下，然后将so文件添加到src/jniLibs/armeabi 目录下没有目录结构的话自己建立，不然会造成如下错误：

No implementation found for int com.baidu.platform.comjni.map.commonmemcache.JNICommonMemCache.Create() (tried Java_com_baidu_platform_comjni_map_commonmemcache_JNICommonMemCache_Create and Java_com_baidu_platform_comjni_map_commonmemcache_JNICommonMemCache_Create__)
在SDKInitializer.initialize(getApplicationContext()) 时候会出错。
entry.summary: 首先，在导入百度地图SDK的时候对于android studio来讲应该将BaiduLBS_Android.jar 添加到项目的

entry.title: Ubuntu 升级内核出现Failed to Symbolic-Link boot/initrd.img-* to initrd.img:File Exists at /Var/lib/dpkg/info/linux-Image-*.Postinst
entry.content:
错误如下：

Setting up linux-image-3.13.0-46-generic (3.13.0-46.76) …
Running depmod.
update-initramfs: deferring update (hook will be called later)
Failed to symbolic-link boot/initrd.img-3.13.0-46-generic to initrd.img:File exists at /var/lib/dpkg/info/linux-image-3.13.0-46-generic.postinst line 629.
dpkg: error processing package linux-image-3.13.0-46-generic (–configure):
subprocess installed post-installation script returned error exit status 17
dpkg: dependency problems prevent configuration of linux-image-extra-3.13.0-46-generic:
linux-image-extra-3.13.0-46-generic depends on linux-image-3.13.0-46-generic; however:
Package linux-image-3.13.0-46-generic is not configured yet.

dpkg: error processing package linux-image-extra-3.13.0-46-generic (–configure):
dependency problems - leaving unconfigured
No apport report written because the error message indicates its a followup error from a previous failure.
E: Sub-process /usr/bin/dpkg returned an error code (1)
解决办法如下：
sudo mv /var/lib/dpkg/info/linux-image-3.13.0-46-generic.postinst .
entry.summary:
错误如下：

Setting up linux-image-3.13.0-46-generic (3.13.0-46.76) …
Running depmod.
update-initramfs: deferring upd

entry.title: Ubuntu安卓开发环境配置(四)
entry.content:
上篇讲了编译环境搭建，这篇讲android studio下载安装。

1.下载android studio

https://developer.android.com/sdk/index.html


需要特殊手段下载，昨天我们不是装了ss么，还有proxychains，我们可以用
proxychains wget -c https://dl.google.com/dl/android/studio/ide-zips/1.0.1/android-studio-ide-135.1641136-linux.zip

2.安装oracle 的java，注意android studio 使用的是oracle的java，参见“学长”张篇文章，不再赘述

http://superwang.me/2014/05/13/install-oracle-java-7-in-ubuntu-via-ppa/

然后昨天我们装了openjdk，今天我们装了oracle，那怎么切换呢如下：

sudo update-alternatives –config java

sudo update-alternatives –config javac

3.进入到android studio 解压目录运行studio.sh

就可以打开软件，第一次打开会初始化， 然后会下载2.5G的sdk，这个可以跳过，在android studio目录下的bin目录下，编辑idea.properties

添加：disable.android.first.run=true
如果你有ipv6环境，下载速度会让你爽到爆，具体设置请看我这篇文章

进入后主题是白色，我们可以设置

File—–settings—–Appearance—–theme
我选择darcula

设置代码配色方案，作为sublime 粉，那必须 设置一下啊：

方法见：https://github.com/Fumler/idea-monokai
来张全图：

 

更详细的anroid studio 详见http://stormzhang.com/devtools/2014/11/25/android-studio-tutorial1/

四篇文章写完，我的电脑也配置的差不多了。最后放上一个小彩蛋，那就是安装zsh，加上我自己基于别人主题修改的炫酷主题。
entry.summary:
上篇讲了编译环境搭建，这篇讲android studio下载安装。

1.下载android studio

entry.title: Ubuntu安卓开发环境配置(三)
entry.content:
上篇讲了常用必备工具，这篇来讲java安装，android 源码编译环境搭建。源码下载。

1.为了后续工作顺利进行我们先来安装shaodowsocks

我选择python版：

sudo apt-get install python-pip

pip install shadowsocks
安装完成后，在/etc/目录下面建立shadowsocks.json文件
sudo vim /etc/shadowsocks.json
输入如下内容:
{
“server”:”x.x.x.x”, //你的ss服务器地址直接写ip
“server_port”:8388, //你的ss服务器的端口
“local_address”:”127.0.0.1”,
“local_port”:1080,
“password”:”**“, //你的ss密码
“timeout”:600,
“method”:”aes-256-cfb”
}
上述内容中在输入的时候“//”和后面中文都要去掉，保存后将sslocal加入开机启动，打开startup applications，填入如下内容：

安装proxychains
sudo apt-get -y install proxychains

配置：
编辑/etc/proxychains.conf将最后一行socks4 127.0.0.1 9050改为 socks5 127.0.0.1 1080

2.安装java， openjdk-7-jdk
sudo apt-get install openjdk-7-jdk
3.安装编译所需软件

做链接
sudo ln -s /usr/lib/i386-linux-gnu/mesa/libGL.so.1 /usr/lib/i386-linux-gnu/libGL.so
ubuntu14.04还需要安装如下包：sudo apt-get install bison g++-multilib git gperf libxml2-utils
将：export USE_CCACHE=1添加到.profile

4.下载源码
安装repo
mkdir ~/bin
PATH=~/bin:$PATH
url https://storage.googleapis.com/git-repo-downloads/repo > ~/bin/repo

chmod a+x ~/bin/repo
创建一个源码目录：
mkdir xxxx

cd xxxx
repo初始化
repo init -u git://github.com/CyanogenMod/android.git -b cm-12.0
-u 指定仓库地址，-b指定源码分支

具体操作可看我下面操作：

5.同步源码

在新建源码目录下：repo sync -j32 或者repo sync -j16 如下操作：

6.源码下载完后进行编译：

. build/envsetup.sh

lunch （然后选择自己机型数字）

make bacon
entry.summary:
上篇讲了常用必备工具，这篇来讲java安装，android 源码编译环境搭建。源码下载。

1.为了后续工作顺利进行我们先来安装shaodowsocks

我选择python版：

sudo apt-get in

entry.title: Ubuntu安卓开发环境配置(二)
entry.content:
上篇文章讲到了系统刚装完之后的简单配置，下面来讲讲两大神器的安装以及TX的球球

1.安装ia32-libs

如果你的系统版本大于等于Ubuntu13.10，安装会比较麻烦如下：

如果你的系统小于Ubunu13.10，那么直接：

2.安装神器beyond Compare

下载地址：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1qWkGjGK
下载后可以双击进行安装，也可以用命令上篇已经讲过如何用命令安装deb了。
激活码见：我之前一篇文章 复制开始和结束中间的key

3.安装神器Sublime Text2

这是我最喜欢的编辑器，没有之一。爱不释手！我选择Sublime Text2因为免费的，不强制购买，他只是会每20次保存提示你购买，已经习惯了。下面进行安装和初步的配置

复杂安装方法：
首先下载最新版： http://www.sublimetext.com/2

解压：

解压出来的文件夹进行重命名mv Sublime\ Text\ 2 sublime

我们将sublime 文件夹放到/usr/local/lib下如下:

做软链接，这样以后使用非常方便

以后我们使用的时候就可以subl xxx ，可以是文件也可以是文件夹 .

最简单的安装方法：

http://www.webupd8.org/2011/03/sublime-text-2-ubuntu-ppa.html

安装完之后对sublime 做初步配置

a.安装package control，然后你就可以安装各种插件了。
快捷键：ctrl_+_`

调出控制台输入安装代码：

b.设置java开发环境。

别人都写过了，我都不写了。请看这里http://blog.sina.com.cn/s/blog_927ae80b010195lg.html

c.安装中文输入支持插件

因为ibus不兼容，fcitx可以支持，因为我钟爱ibus所以装个中文支持插件

d.设置shell script测试命令[[ 为[

参见我的这篇文章

e.设置默认新建文件为java

快捷键：ctrl+shift+p 选择install package，安装Default File Type

然后新建：Packages/User/default_file_type.sublime-settings文件

编辑如下：

4.安装qq，总得跟人交流吧

下载wine-qqintel 国际版qq所需组件：

http://packages.linuxdeepin.com/enterprise/pool/non-free/d/deepinwine-qqintl/wine-qqintl_0.1.3-2_i386.deb

http://packages.linuxdeepin.com/ubuntu/pool/main/t/ttf-wqy-microhei/ttf-wqy-microhei_0.2.0-beta-1_all.deb

先安装字体wqy-microhei 依赖，然后安装qqintl

如果安装出错如下，请再搜索安装liblcms2-2:i386


然后在重新安装qqintl就可。

下篇文章讲安装java，搭建android源码编译环境，下载源码。敬请期待！
